entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 23. POP 30%
entry.summary: Clear early this evening then partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries late this evening and overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 6:11 PM CST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 14.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 26 in the morning and minus 20 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 6:11 PM CST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 15.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Snow beginning near midnight. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light overnight. Temperature steady near minus 15. Wind chill minus 25 in the evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 6:11 PM CST Wednesday 25 January 2023
